title: "error in champion selection"
body: If the new client keeps glitching when I am in the ban stage not allowing me to select anyone to ban, why am I being punished if its telling me there is an error?

replies.body:
This isn't an issue I've heard anyone else mention so far. From personal experience though, I played league on a really, really bad laptop for like a year, it frequently crashed in game, and I was put into leavers nearly every day.

Never once have I afk'd or left a game willingly, but could you imagine how many other people would say that?

Riot can't let people off of their punishments because of an underperforming machine, because that's an excuse everyone could use.
At the end of the day, if you're the cause for inconvenience, the hammer needs to fall somewhere.
